Reviews.Title: DEPENDABLE

Reviews.Content: Finally, after three returns from other venders I found YOU. Your service and speed in which the item was shipped and the cell phone reliablity is great. Very Satisfied and thanks for a great service.

Reviews.Content: It arrived very fast, it works very good, i didnt have any problem with the phone, just like in the picture
